Flow.description: All updates to Quote before saving the record. SFDC-14864: Core CPQ: New CPQ Quote Template for Partner Level = National for Direct Orders and for Tech Data US SFDC-14319: Force Quotes to obtain reapproval after the AccountID for End User has changed SFDC-18050 : Multiple Reseller SFDC-18014-19196: New Quote Template Design for all the accounts (Reseller, Distributor, End User, National Direct) SFDC-19630 : Added New Conditions to Net Amount Changed SFDC-19727 : Added Steps to Set Current Max Additional discount SFDC-20084 : SPE discount Percentage change SFDC-20203: Updated Shipping Contact mapping on Quote SFDC-SFDC-20793,20792,20794 SFDC-20836:- Remove Auto Renewal Quote status assignment in insert.
